job_history.work_description: Maintained server operation, security, and analyzed and diagnosed system hardware and software components. Created documents in Word and Power Point referencing problems encountered during trouble shooting for other group members. Conducted short training sessions for the group via OSC conference calls.

Assisted public electronic filing programmers by analyzing, diagnosing, and making proposals on errors in software to get their software to pass IRS standards for electronic filing. Maintained network and desktop computers, installed updates to workstations, and used network sniffer to troubleshoot connection issues.

interests: Spending quality time with family and friends

skills.name: System Administration
skills.explanation: Over 30 years of experience in system administration, including server operation, security, and hardware and software troubleshooting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in analyzing and diagnosing system hardware and software components, as well as network connection issues, demonstrating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Computer Security
skills.explanation: Maintained server security and used network sniffer to troubleshoot connection issues, showing strong proficiency in computer security.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Used Microsoft Word and Power Point to create documents and conducted training sessions, suggesting strong proficiency in Microsoft Office.
